description: Speciality coffee from Brazil, roasted by 2016 World Roasting Champion, Audun Sorbotten. Light roast, perfect for pour over brewing methods. Coffee with dominant sweetness of chocolate and low acidity.
title: Audun Coffee - Brazil Fazenda Rainha Miaki

description: This one is a flagship blend from our Swedish friends, Johan & Nyström. It is a medium roast coffee that will blow your taste buds when prepared in an espresso machine or a moka pot.
title: Johan & Nyström - Espresso Fairtrade

description: Meloria is a blend of Arabica beans (75%) and Robusta (25%) created for those who prefer intense flavor. Coffee prepared with these beans will have a lasting crema, full body, vanilla aroma and chocolate notes.
title: Arcaffe Meloria 1kg

description: Speciality coffee from Brazil, roasted by 2015 World Roasting Champion, Audun Sorbotten. Medium roast, perfect for espresso. Coffee with dominant chocolate and nut-like sweetness, and low acidity.
title: Audun Coffee - Brazil Fazenda Rainha Miaki Espresso 500g

description: This set includes the king of alternative coffee makers - Hario Dripper and coffee beans from Ethiopia roasted by HAYB. Perfect way to prepare black coffee - for the beginners and experienced home-baristas!
title: Set: Dripper Hario V60-02 + HAYB Coffee

description: Speciality coffee beans from Costa Rica, roasted by HAYB roastery from Poland. Light roast, perfect for filter coffee machines, drippers, Chemex, AeroPress, French Press, and other pour-over brewing methods. You can expect hints of cherry, raspberry and milk chocolate.
title: HAYB - Costa Rica Las Lajas

description: Speciality coffee from Guatemala, roasted in Poland by Hard Beans roastery. Light roast, perfect for filter coffee machines, drippers, Chemex, AeroPress, French Press, and other pour-over brewing methods. In taste, sweet and fruity. You can expect hints of ripe strawberries, pink wine, and pineapple.
title: Hard Beans - Guatemala CO-CHANGERS

description: Speciality coffee from Honduras, roasted by Nordbeans from the Czech Republic. Light roast, perfect for filter coffee machines, drippers, Chemex, AeroPress, French Press, and other pour-over brewing methods. Sweet and fruity, with the highlighted notes of apples, blackberries and milk chocolate.
title: Nordbeans - Honduras Danny Moreno
